activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
HomeAway, Inc. ("HomeAway") and its subsidiaries connect homeowners and property managers with travelers in order to make available to them vacation rental homes throughout the world. HomeAway runs specialist websites in various countries, including, but not limited to HomeAway.com, VRBO.com, and VacationRentals.com in the United States; holidayrentals.co.uk and ownersdirect.co.uk in the United Kingdom; fewo-direkt.de in Germany; arbitel.fr and homelidays.fr in France; AlugueTemporada.com.br in Brazil; HomeAaway.es and Toprural.com in Spain and realholidays.com.au and homeaway.com.au in Australia. Together the sites controlled by HomeAway offer rental properties in more than 168 countries. HomeAway is developing its portfolio of websites in this and related fields, including the operation of bedandbreakfast.com, a global site finding bed and breakfast accommodation. HomeAway collects, processes, and retains data on people looking to rent out their accommodation, people wishing to advertise their properties, people wishing to stay in properties, and on employees and third parties it does business with. HomeAway has European operations in a number of countries and offices in Switzerland, France, Germany, Spain and the United Kingdom.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
